= HistoryToken / Anchor Tag Navigation =
 Navigating with anchor tags is very cool. You can also add parameters to your anchor tag. 
 * HistoryToken = Anchor Tag - so we can stay on the same page. like domain.tld#anchorTag?var1=a&var2=b...
